dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: ...I never got your name rookie.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Would be nice to know if you ask me.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Or are you not talkative?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: ...Vera.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Vera...?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Yes, that is my name.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Huh... faith and truth... that's...

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Kinda cute, actually.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: *ahem* Forget I said anything.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: It's fine... what's your name?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: You know, it's only fair since I told you mine.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Uh-huh, it's only fair.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Name's Ellie.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Light and noble... I can see why.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Light and noble? Why's that? You look into name meanings or something?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Obviously, and that’s what your name means. I look into that stuff sometimes, just a habit y'know?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Curiosity kills the cat... a little morbid meaning but all in all a literal thing that can happen.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: I knew people like that. Friends, coworkers... idiots who poked their heads into wrong things.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: They were idiots yes, but not everything's gonna be sunshine and rainbows...

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: I'm sure you'd know that...

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: You're right, I do... guess something like that is unavoidable in this line of work.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Oh well, to hell with it, it's not like we're touchable.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I've gone my whole life going through shit, and I'm still here.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I've seen hell like no one else, Ellie.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: People messing with things they shouldn’t... and paying the price.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: One by one. I just watched. I'm numb to it now.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: ...what the fuck Vera? I'm numb to it now.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: ...what the fuck Vera? Are you insane?

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: That's all you have to say? How did you even get through selection with such an attitude!?

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: You know what? I don't care, don't answer it.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I don't wanna hear it.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Not after such crap Ms. Negative.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I-... sorry... didn't mea-

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Sorry's not gonna cut it Vera.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I know... I didn't mean it.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: *sighs* Fine. Apology accepted, for now, just don't say stuff like that again or I will have to report it.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Hear you loud and clear, Ellie...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: ...sooo uh... I'm not exactly a good conversation starter but uh...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Do you have any... pets?

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Just curious...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Pets? Well, if you really wanna know...

branch.speaker: Robber2
branch.line: A cat.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: A cat?

branch.speaker: Robber2
branch.line: Yeah, a cat.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: That's nice... I... I always wanted one... never got one though.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Oh... sorry to hear that.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: I'm sure Grumpy would like you.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Grumpy?

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Yeah, that's what I called 'em. They are quite literally, grumpy.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: *chuckles* That's... a nice name. I like it.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Glad you think so.

dialogue.line: Christmas lights flicker overhead as the two enjoy the break time...

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: *sigh* you ever wonder if we'd get a normal Christmas this week?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Like with all the snow and stuff?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: I always hope we'd do, no snow is just... boring. Puddles and stuff all around.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I hope so.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: It's not really Christmas if there's no snow right?

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: All these puddles should be frozen or something by now.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: It is freezing even in this warm outfit.
Or you're just not used to the cold.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: These are pretty warm.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Not my point but okay...

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: It should start snowing soon... really.

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: You're right, it should...

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: I just hope you're right.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: It really wouldn't change much for me...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: How so?

branch.speaker: Partner
branch.line: Well... even if the snow was on the ground or not...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: I've never had a real Christmas.

branch.speaker: Robber2
branch.line: No one to spend time with, to celebrate it...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Just loneliness in the cold.

branch.speaker: Robber2
branch.line: ...why's that? You had parents to spend it with right?

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: ...right?

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: Oh...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: I was just an orphan.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: A freak accident.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: It was years ago, but Christmas just... reminds me of it every time.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: I'm here.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: ...What do you mean...?

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: ...I'm here, Vera.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: That's what I mean.

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: ...Thanks...

branch.speaker: Player
branch.line: You're welcome...

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: You know... I got an idea.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: What's that?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: We could... spend the Christmas together.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Then you wouldn't be alone... or cold.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: And I'm sure Grumpy would love to see someone new as well.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: I'll have to think about it...

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Not ready to give an answer right away.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: That's fine. I can ask again after the day's over?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Sure.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Now, we should start to head back.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Break time's gonna be over soon.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: You ready to go?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Oh uhm, yeah, I'm ready.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.line: Let's go then.
